description: Delete an action item line item.
permissions: User must be authorized to delete action items via the delegated ActionItemLineItemPolicy (delegated to action_item); action item destroy permission allows admins or users with appropriate org membership per ActionItemPolicy.
side_effects: Deletes the action item line item and triggers an asynchronous action item summary update.
validation_notes: The action item line item ID argument is required. --confirm must be true to proceed.
